Moo::ResourceLoadContext

Moo::ResourceLoadContext Class Reference

This class keeps track of the resource currently being loaded, useful for when reporting errors for example. More...

Detailed Description

This class keeps track of the resource currently being loaded, useful for when reporting errors for example.
